912.question: what metrics are used in evaluation?
912.response: {'Answer': 'F1 ± std (F1 score with standard deviation), LM perplexity Fwd, LM perplexity Bwd'}

914.question: what previous systems were compared to?
914.response: {'Answer': 'The previous systems compared to are Yang et al. (2017), Hashimoto et al. (2016), Søgaard and Goldberg (2016), Chiu and Nichols (2016), Lample et al. (2016), Ma and Hovy (2016), Collobert et al. (2011), and Luo et al. (2015).'}
914.answer: Chiu and Nichols (2016), Lample et al. (2016), Ma and Hovy (2016), Yang et al. (2017), Hashimoto et al. (2016), Søgaard and Goldberg (2016)
